alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 10:55PM CDT until September 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1054 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Pringle to 6 miles south of Panhandle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 1043 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 59 mph wind gust 4 miles west northwest of Pantex. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Panhandle, Miami, Stinnett, White Deer, Mclean, Groom, Lefors, Skellytown, Lake Mcclellan, Lora, Kingsmill, Alanreed, and Codman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
